data.title: Portland Trail Blazers Roster
data.meta_description: Portland Trail Blazers scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
2025 second round draft pick from Atlanta

Atlanta's 2025 2nd round pick to Portland protected for selections 41-59 or to Oklahoma City protected for selections 31-40 (Atlanta's obligation to Portland or Oklahoma City will thereafter be extinguished) [Atlanta-Oklahoma City, 11/24/2020; Atlanta-Oklahoma City, 9/27/2022 (partial removal of protection); Atlanta-Detroit-Golden State-Portland, 2/9/2023]

2026 second round draft pick from Memphis

Memphis' 2026 2nd round pick to Atlanta protected for sections 43-60 or to Portland protected for selections 31-42 (Memphis' obligation to Atlanta or Portland will thereafter be extinguished) (via Utah to Atlanta; via Utah to Golden State to Portland) [Memphis-Utah, 8/7/2021; Golden State-Utah, 8/7/2021; Atlanta-Detroit-Golden State-Portland, 2/9/2023; Atlanta-Utah, 7/7/2023]

2028 first round draft pick from Milwaukee (Portland outgoing)

Portland has the right to swap its 2028 1st round pick, protected for selections 15-30 if Portland has not conveyed a 1st round pick to Chicago by 2027, for Milwaukee's 2028 1st round pick [Milwaukee-Phoenix-Portland, 9/27/2023]

2028 second round draft pick from Golden State

Golden State's 2028 2nd round pick to Portland [Atlanta-Detroit-Golden State-Portland, 2/9/2023]

2029 first round draft pick from Boston

Boston's 2029 1st round pick to Portland [Boston-Portland, 10/1/2023]

2029 first round draft pick from Milwaukee

Milwaukee's 2029 1st round pick to Portland [Milwaukee-Phoenix-Portland, 9/27/2023]

2030 first round draft pick from Milwaukee (swap, Portland outgoing)

Portland has the right to swap its 2030 1st round pick for Milwaukee's 2030 1st round pick [Milwaukee-Phoenix-Portland, 9/27/2023]

2025 first round draft pick to Chicago

Portland's 1st round pick to Chicago protected for selections 1-14 in 2025, 1-14 in 2026, 1-14 in 2027 and 1-14 in 2028; if Portland has not conveyed a 1st round pick to Chicago by 2028, then Portland will instead convey its 2028 2nd round pick to Chicago [Chicago-Portland, 8/28/2021]

2025 second round draft pick to Sacramento

Portland's 2025 2nd round pick to Sacramento [Portland-Sacramento, 1/21/2020]

2026 second round draft pick to Boston, San Antonio or Washington

Boston will receive the most favorable of Minnesota's 2026 2nd round pick, New York's 2026 2nd round pick, New Orleans' 2026 2nd round pick and Portland's 2026 2nd round pick; New York will receive the less favorable of its pick and the Minnesota pick; San Antonio will receive the less favorable of the New Orleans pick and the Portland pick; Washington will receive the less favorable of (i) the more favorable of the Minnesota pick and the New York pick and (ii) the more favorable of the New Orleans pick and the Portland pick (via Minnesota to New York; via New Orleans to Portland to New Orleans; via Portland to Detroit; via New Orleans to San Antonio; via Detroit to Boston; via Detroit to Washington) [Minnesota-New York, 11/24/2020; New Orleans-Portland, 7/30/2021; New Orleans-Portland, 2/8/2022; Detroit-Portland, 7/6/2022; Detroit-New York, 7/11/2022; New Orleans-San Antonio, 2/9/2023; Boston-Detroit, 6/28/2023; Detroit-Washington, 1/14/2024]

2027 second round draft pick to Charlotte (effectively a swap, New Orleans incoming) [this overlaps with another outgoing pick from Portland]

Charlotte will receive the more favorable of Portland's 2027 2nd round pick and New Orleans' 2027 2nd round pick and Portland will receive the less favorable of the two; Portland may convey the pick it receives to Boston (see Portland Outgoing) (via New Orleans to Portland) [New Orleans-Portland, 2/8/2022; Charlotte-Philadelphia-Portland-New York, 2/9/2023]

2027 second round draft pick to Boston (Portland or New Orleans outgoing) [this overlaps with another outgoing pick from Portland]

Boston will receive the less favorable of Portland's 2027 2nd round pick and New Orleans' 2027 2nd round pick if this pick falls outside its protected range of 31-55 (if this pick falls within its protected range and is therefore not conveyed, then Portland's obligation to Boston will be extinguished) (via Portland) [New Orleans-Portland, 2/8/2022; Charlotte-Philadelphia-Portland-New York, 2/9/2023; Boston-Portland, 2/8/2024]

2029 second round draft pick to Indiana

Portland's 2029 2nd round pick to Indiana (via Philadelphia) [Charlotte-Philadelphia-Portland-New York, 2/9/2023; Indiana-Philadelphia-San Antonio, 2/8/2024]

Donovan Clingan was selected as the #7 pick in the First Round of the 2024 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Donovan Clingan signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 4, 2024.

Scoot Henderson was selected as the #3 pick in the First Round of the 2023 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Scoot Henderson signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 1, 2023.

Kris Murray was selected as the #23 pick in the First Round of the 2023 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Kris Murray signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 1, 2023.

Rayan Rupert was selected as the #13 pick in the Second Round of the 2023 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Rayan Rupert signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 4, 2023.

Shaedon Sharpe was selected as the #7 pick in the First Round of the 2022 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Shaedon Sharpe signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 1, 2022.

Anfernee Simons was selected as the #24 pick in the First Round of the 2018 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Anfernee Simons signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 2, 2018. Anfernee Simons re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 6, 2022.

Jabari Walker was selected as the #27 pick in the Second Round of the 2022 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Jabari Walker signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 13, 2022.

Deni Avdija was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Washington Wizards on July 6, 2024.

Deandre Ayton was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Phoenix Suns on September 27, 2023.

Dalano Banton was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Boston Celtics on February 8, 2024.

Toumani Camara was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Phoenix Suns on September 27, 2023.

Jerami Grant was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Detroit Pistons on July 6, 2022. Jerami Grant signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 9, 2023.

Matisse Thybulle was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Philadelphia Sixers on February 9, 2023. Matisse Thybulle re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 10, 2023.

Robert Williams was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Boston Celtics on October 1, 2023.
